mapper.insert: insert into tb_emp(name, gender, entrydate, crate_time, update_time, username, job) values (#{name}, #{gender}, #{entrydate}, #{crateTime}, #{updateTime}, #{username}, #{job})
mapper.update: update tb_emp set name=#{name}, gender=#{gender},entrydate=#{entrydate},crate_time=#{crateTime},update_time=#{updateTime},username=#{username},job=#{job} where id = #{id}
